title: chalk like font
content:
Anybody knows which font is the one used in the "Easter Egg Hunt" text, it has a chalky look.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022104401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/welcome-sign-2-584x389_3742.jpg)
author: weinda

comments.content: To me, it's either [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022104401/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Helvetica+neue) ("welcome to our" is Helvetica Neue) with a sketch post-treatment or [Sketchetik](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022104401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hiekkagraphics/sketchetik).
